name: Lucas and the Casual Acquaintances
description:
Lucas Goodman is a lanky, brash, and occasionally philosophical teenager who has found himself alone in detention. Deciding he’d rather be doing literally anything else, Lucas begins scouring the school in search of a mysterious wind up toy he saw break through a classroom window. Join Lucas as he roams the halls of his high school after hours, and encounter a wide variety of eccentric individuals: some are friends, most are foes, and all are kind of idiots. Expect turn based combat, blunt dialogue, and a lot of arbitrary reasons to kick some people in the shins.

Features:

  • JRPG Turn Based Combat
  • No more than three additional party members
  • Naughty words
  • Approximately 45 minutes of gameplay
  • Occasional Need to Strategize
  • Bad Hairdos

This is my first attempt at a game which involves a fair amount of balancing and mechanic tweaking, so if you have any questions, problems, or suggestions feel free to comment or email me!

Plugins Used:

  •  KockaAdmiralac’s Follow Up Skills
  • Galv’s Message Sound Effects
  • Himeworks’ Enemy Reinforcements
  • Yanfly’s Core Engine
  • Yanfly’s Message Core
  • Yanfly’s Battle Engine Core
  • Yanfly’s Battle Status Window
